rooms.description: Two-car garage with ample space, minimalistic Scandinavian design, integrated lighting and ventilation, and built-in storage solutions

Open-plan kitchen and living area featuring Scandinavian minimalism with clean lines, functional spaces for cooking, dining, and socializing. Vastu compliance achieved by proper directional alignment of entryway and windows.
Luxury bedroom designed as a retreat with ample natural light, Scandinavian aesthetics, integrated closet space, and a serene ambiance in accordance to Vastu principles for energy flow.

openings.description: Large main entrance with a welcoming aesthetic that aligns with Scandinavian design principles and Vastu requirements of north-east direction for entry.
Large window openings in the living area to maximize natural light, strategically placed as per Vastu guidelines.
